00034 struct GIM_PAIR
00035 {
00036     int m_index1;
00037     int m_index2;
00038     GIM_PAIR()
00039     {}
00040 
00041     GIM_PAIR(const GIM_PAIR & p)
00042     {
00043         m_index1 = p.m_index1;
00044         m_index2 = p.m_index2;
00045         }
00046 
00047         GIM_PAIR(int index1, int index2)
00048     {
00049         m_index1 = index1;
00050         m_index2 = index2;
00051         }
00052 };
00053 
00055 struct GIM_BVH_DATA
00056 {
00057         btAABB m_bound;
00058         int m_data;
00059 };
00060 
00062 class GIM_BVH_TREE_NODE
00063 {
00064 public:
00065         btAABB m_bound;
00066 protected:
00067         int     m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex;
00068 public:
00069         GIM_BVH_TREE_NODE()
00070         {
00071                 m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex = 0;
00072         }
00073 
00074         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isLeafNode() const
00075         {
00076                 //skipindex is negative (internal node), triangleindex >=0 (leafnode)
00077                 return (m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex>=0);
00078         }
00079 
00080         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getEscapeIndex() const
00081         {
00082                 //btAssert(m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex < 0);
00083                 return -m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex;
00084         }
00085 
00086         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setEscapeIndex(int index)
00087         {
00088                 m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex = -index;
00089         }
00090 
00091         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getDataIndex() const
00092         {
00093                 //btAssert(m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex >= 0);
00094 
00095                 return m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex;
00096         }
00097 
00098         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setDataIndex(int index)
00099         {
00100                 m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex = index;
00101         }
00102 
00103 };
